intro: Richetia kuantanensis, commonly known as the Kuantan richetia, is a rare flowering plant native to Malaysia. It belongs to the family Malvaceae and is characterized by its hairy stems and lobed leaves. The plant produces small, clustered flowers that are typically pink or purple in color. It is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species.
